name: Kharakternik
description:
The modern European way of life was shaped by the balance of chaos and order in people's minds. This order is guarded by superheroes from all over the world. Kharakternik is a Ukrainian сossack with a super abilities who wanders in the world of chaos, restores order and closes portals through which evil spirits, that bring chaos, enter the humans world

Game was made during "United with ukraine game jam" event, in less than 48h.

This particular version have some content added after game jam, like bug fixes and better background images.

2D Artist - Daria Mróz
3D Artists - Kamil Sell and Krystian Olesiejko
Narrative designer - Tetiana Rudenko 
Programmer - Miłosz Klim

Controls:
-A & D - movemet
-Space - jump
-Q & E - skills
